definition: Anthemis, genus of flowers in Compositae including chamomile

sentences.english: Avoid this product if you are allergic to ragweed or daisy-like flowers.
sentences.chinese: 对豚草或或春黄菊过敏者请防止使用本品。

sentences.english: On the night of the same day, Huang attended the welcoming banquet held by Mogae.
sentences.chinese: 当晚，黄菊出席了莫哈埃举行的欢迎宴会。

sentences.english: Huang said that the traditional China-Azerbaijan friendship enjoys a long history.
sentences.chinese: 黄菊表示，中阿传统友谊历史悠久。

sentences.english: During their talks, Huang Ju and Juncker exchanged views mainly on promoting economic and trade cooperation. Huang Ju made the following proposals.
sentences.chinese: 黄菊和容克在会谈中着重就促进经贸合作交换了看法。

sentences.english: On the night of the same day, Huang attended the welcoming banquet held by Diallo.
sentences.chinese: 当天晚上，黄菊出席了迪亚洛举行的欢迎宴会。

definition: yellow flowers (of various types)/chrysanthemum/cauliflower/(yellow) daylily/a young virgin (boy or girl)
plum blossom/clubs ♣ (a suit in card games)/wintersweet (dialect)
autumn frost/fig. white hair as sign of old age
yellow flower (cosmetic powder used on women's forehead in former times)
